general.gigTitle: design shopify website, develop shopify theme, fix shopify bugs

sellerCard.oneLiner: Specialize in crafting stunning Shopify websites
sellerCard.description: With over 6 years in eCommerce development, I specialize in crafting stunning Shopify websites for brands worldwide. From startups to large enterprises, I've helped businesses achieve their goals with beautiful, user-friendly websites. Whether it's website backup & migration, development, speed optimization, or custom design using Shopify and WordPress, I bring expertise in CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and UI/UX design tools like Adobe Photoshop, Adobe XD, and Figma. Let's collaborate to turn your website ideas into top-notch, effective solutions for your online success.

description.content:
I do custom Shopify development based on your design or Reference website using modern web development


Your website is a great way to communicate your values and brand message with your customers and with over 5 years of experience in Shopify development, I have helped more than 100 small and large business to establish a strong online presence with the websites that delivers a strong brand message to the consumer.


Services we offer:


  • Convert PSD/Figma/Adobe XD or any reference into fully functional and responsive Shopify theme.
  • Develop custom landing pages, opt-in pages and sales pages based on your design.
  • I develop complex functionalities on product pages and collection pages to ensure you meet you business needs.


Frequent communication is very important to me as it ensures the job is completed according to your requirements. And I take pride on delivering the best Quality work.


I'm always available to work on big projects, on-going projects, and quick modifications.


Don't See what you need in my packages? Drop me a message and I will be very happy to help.


Order now and let's work on your next great brand.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does the theme you develop is fully customizable?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! You can change all the content, images, colors and fonts from Shopify theme editor without any further coding

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you create various types of websites on Shopify?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely, I specialize as a full-time Shopify developer with over 5 years of dedicated experience. I've successfully crafted a wide range of websites, from simple to intricate designs, integrating diverse functionalities and content.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your starting rate for Shopify websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The starting rate for a Shopify website is $90 for a single page website, with an estimated timeline of approximately 3-4 days. Discover more details in the following Q&A about what this covers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What does your starting rate include?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
1: Responsive design.
2: Backend setup and configuration. 
3: Website branding and theme customization. 
4: This can be homepage, Product page or any static page.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert designs from Figma, PSD, or Adobe XD to Shopify?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I bring extensive expertise in transforming UI/UX designs into fully responsive, pixel-perfect, and highly customizable Shopify websites.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What does your starting price for development of custom design website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The starting Price for development of custom design to Shopify is $500, which includes 8 pages. If the design have more pages, contact now for pricing.

packageList.title: 3-4 Small Bugs Fixing
packageList.description: Will fix small bugs (60 minutes of coding) IMPORTANT: PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE PURCHASING THIS GIG

packageList.title: Homepage, collection & product page
packageList.description: Will Develop 3 pages mentioned above, fully functional and responsive based on your design

packageList.title: Full Web creation upto 8 pages
packageList.description: Includes Homepage, collection & product page and 3 static pages like about/contact/blogs pages

reviews.comment:
The seller is not reliable. All the time issues with “completed task”. Nothing is working properly after time. Telling the work is complete, after I’m pointing “it’s not”, changing words that did’t finish yet. 
Even though I explained all requirements, he sending million questions (instead of reading carefully the explanation). 

So much mess in work and communication.

seller_response.comment:
I value and respect client feedback, but I’m deeply disappointed by this review, particularly as this was from a repeat client. I have consistently worked hard to deliver high-quality work and ensure client satisfaction. In this case, I fulfilled all agreed-upon requirements and delivered the project as requested.

Unfortunately, after successfully completing the work and ensuring satisfaction, the client initiated a chargeback dispute. This decision prevented me from addressing any concerns or making adjustments, despite my openness to resolving any issues.

I always prioritize clear communication, professionalism, and client satisfaction. My commitment to quality is reflected in the positive experiences of my many satisfied clients. For prospective clients, I want to assure you that I take every project seriously and strive to deliver exceptional results while maintaining transparency throughout the process.

reviews.comment: Did a great job on tasks
